title.value: Влияние сезона года на качество спермопродукции хряков-производителей датской селекции, адаптированных к условиям Республики Беларусь
Influence of a season on sperm quality of the boars of Danish selection adapted for conditions of Belarus
Influence of a season on sperm quality of the boars of Danish selection adapted for conditions of Belarus

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Shlyk, P.N., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: The influence of seasonal changes in Republic of Belarus on the semen quality of the boars imported from Denmark was studied in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. Research has been lead on boars Landras (1 group) and Jorkshir (2 group), in each group on 5 heads of identical age. All animals cultivated in identical conditions of feeding and the maintenance, and also at an identical mode of a sperm capture. The increase of spermatozoa concentration in winter was ascertained resulting in higher number of semen doses obtained per boar during this season. Because of sperm parameters have the worst values during the summer period, maintenance of boars with optimum conditions of feeding and the maintenance (especially observance of optimum parameters of a microclimate in cattle-breeding rooms) during this period is important. For this purpose it is necessary to observe the basic hygienic requirements to a microclimate in rooms during the transitive and summer periods of year: to improve parameters of air exchange (м3/h on 1 centner of weights) in rooms up to 60 - in a transition period, up to 70 - in the summer. Speed of air movement (km/s) in room during the summer period should make 1 km/s unlike 0,2 km/s in the winter and in a transition period.
